channel.title: Help How do i change name of Bank (The Bank of trisidiax) Anyone?
channel.description: [b]Does anyone know how i can change the The Bank of trisidiax [/b] :| :|

item.title: Help How do i change name of Bank (The Bank of trisidiax) Anyone?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Docent:

Search for that line in your server and change it to what u want.

It’s done client sided this time
Because of:

supermimez:

Or you can hardcode it out. goto RSinterface in your client and search for rsInterface.message = stream.readString(); and note it out (//) incase you want to change it back. Then directly below that add rsInterface.message = stream.readString().replaceAll("RuneScape", "Your Server Name");, it will replace every word “runescape” and switch it to your server name withch would be , “bank of runescape”, “When you have finished playing runescape” and stuff like that. Hope this helped.

Read full topic
item.source: Help How do i change name of Bank (The Bank of trisidiax) Anyone?

item.title: Help How do i change name of Bank (The Bank of trisidiax) Anyone?
item.dc:creator: @supermimez supermimez
item.description:
@supermimez wrote:

Or you can hardcode it out. goto RSinterface in your client and search for rsInterface.message = stream.readString(); and note it out (//) incase you want to change it back. Then directly below that add rsInterface.message = stream.readString().replaceAll("RuneScape", "Your Server Name");, it will replace every word “runescape” and switch it to your server name withch would be , “bank of runescape”, “When you have finished playing runescape” and stuff like that. Hope this helped.
